column5: This luxurious 4 bedroom, 3 bath home is in Grand Prairie, Texas. Conveniently located in the Dallas / Fort Worth Metroplex area, about 20 mins from AT&T Stadium and also downtown Dallas. This house should make you feel right at home. Perfect for family and friend groups. This magnificent residence has a large kitchen and very cool movie room for a fun movie night or to watch your favorite sporting events. Football fans welcome! (Watch parties 20 ppl max)  Wifi and Satellite Tv available.
